about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with these beautifully narrated spoken word immersions from the Exhale XR wellness library.

Experience Details
Inspiring, uplifting and thought provoking, the Exhale XR spoken word immersions provide you with an extra pep in your step. Flow through these narrated immersions as the spoken words elevate your vibration.

Purpose
Calming
Uplifting
Inspiring
Spoken word


Length
9:41

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

Credits
Remi Lekun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
